CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1952, pg. 14 reads: "Notables at Potentate's Banquet- When Sahara Temple 2, of the Ancient Egyptian Arabic Order of Nobles of the Mystic Shrine held its annual "Potentates' Ball and Reception" in English Room of the Fort Pitt Hotel last Friday...Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Portrait of man wearing dark three piece tuxedo, dark bow tie, and Sahara fez, posed in interior of the Fort Pitt Hotel with marble walls and male figurative sculpture for Shriners Potentate's Ball
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Sculpture--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Ancient Arabic Order of the Nobles of the Mystic Shrine for North America.Hats--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Banquets--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Fort Pitt Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Men--Portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
